Title: Relates to prohibiting the admission of COVID-19 positive residents to residential facilities for persons with developmental disabilities
Summary: Prohibits the admission of COVID-19 positive residents to residential facilities for persons with developmental disabilities.
LawCode: Add ยง13.44, Ment Hyg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the mental hygiene law, in relation to prohibiting the admission of COVID-19 positive residents to residential facilities for persons with developmental disabilities
